Índice del paquete

Todas las funciones

biometryPlot()
Create Biometry Plot
biometryStat()
Calculate Biometry Statistics
computeFlowering()
Compute Summary Statistics for Flowering Variables
diversityCommunity()
Diversity Indices for Plant Communities
herbivory()
Calculate Herbivory Metrics and Create a Plot
hojas_validas
hojas_validas Dataset
launch_famexplorer()
Run the famexploreR Shiny Application
neighborAbundance_stats()
Calculate Neighbor Abundance Statistics
neighborSpecies_stats()
Summarizes neighbor species data
plotCommunity()
Plot Plant Community Data
plotFlowering()
Create a bar plot with error bars for flowering/fructification data.
prepareGeo()
Prepare Geo Spatial Data
preparePopup()
preparaPopup function
readAllsheets()
Read data from all sheets of an uploaded file.
summarizeSoil()
Summarize Soil Data
ternaryPlot()
Generate a Ternary Plot with Customizable Axis Labels
vecindadPlot()
Generate Vecindad Plot
